summary:
Here is a summary of the document in 3-5 sentences, focusing on the main topic and key concepts:

The 7th Edition of Call of Cthulhu, a role-playing game, was revised and written by Paul Fricker and Mike Mason, with contributions from various authors and designers. The game's editorial team, including Scott Dorward and Badger McInnes, oversaw the design format, layout, and art direction. The game's content, including chapters and investigator sheets, was developed by a team of authors and designers, with updates and revisions made by various contributors. The game's acknowledgements and dedications express gratitude to the fans, backers, and supporters who helped make the new edition a reality.

qa_pairs.question: Who introduced the author Paul Fricker to roleplaying games and the works of H.P. Lovecraft?
What is the title of the Lovecraftian story that the author read from one of his father's books?
Who are the recipients of the first two thank-you messages?
What are the two recipients of the third thank-you message?
qa_pairs.answer: The fans and backers of Call of Cthulhu and Chaosium

qa_pairs.question: What did Phillip Sidebotham introduce Paul Fricker to?
qa_pairs.answer: Roleplaying games and the works of H.P. Lovecraft

qa_pairs.question: What is the title of the publication being referenced in the thank-you messages?
What is the name of the company being referenced in the thank-you messages?
Who wrote the 7th edition rules with development and additional material?
Who assisted with Cristoforo font typesetting?
Who helped with the revised weapon tables?
Who wrote the chapter 'Amidst the Ancient Trees'?
Who designed the 7th edition investigator sheets?
Who assisted with the revised weapon tables?
Who assisted with Cristoforo font typesetting?
What edition does this current edition draw from earlier editions of Call of Cthulhu rules?
Who are some of the authors whose work has been used or revised in this current edition?
qa_pairs.answer: Sandy Petersen, Lynn Willis, Keith Herber, Kevin Ross, Mark Morrison, William Hamblin, Scott David Aniolowski, Michael Tice, Shannon Appel, Eric Rowe, Bruce Ballon, William G. Dunn, Sam Johnson, Brian M. Sammons, Jan Eng
